typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ArchivePath as string ("adfdemoc/Src_Backup")
}
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		Model as string,
		Length as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['/Event/','Src_Backup']) ~> source1
source1 derive(len = right(toString(Length),2),
		ID = coalesce(ID,0)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		Model as string,
		Length as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['set identity_insert Cars on'],
	postSQLs:['set identity_insert Cars off'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
